name: GALAXY TOP WING
summary: This is an independent development of casual games, is the experience of virtual reality space shooting game. The player flying in the universe and sitting in the cockpit and observing the magnificent cosmic scenes outside the fighter by the VR, through the meteorite zones chasing and shooting with the enemy fighters in space with their teammates and attacking the enemy's spaceship. Follow up plans also develop planetary exploration, Galaxy roaming, and spaceship wars.
